name: Mahammadpur Milan Ekadash
briefDescription: To improve and strengthen the Socio- economic condition of the downtrodden people of rural areas by providing education, health and livelihood service to the poor, needy and distressed.Vision : To provide complete support, protection and care to needy, underprivileged and marginalized people of rural areas and aim to bring in change in their lives to a better tomorrow, a society  of economic and social justice.Mission : The Mahammadpur Milan Ekadash strives to improve the quality of life of the needy rural communities as  to the underprivileged children women and old age person for achieving their minimum requirement to gain self- confidence for living with dignity, equity and self-respect. by promoting meaningful education, health a
